QuestData.Title: Improper Burial
QuestData.Description:
De blood trolls are gathering de corpses of my people for their blood magic. Dis ends today.
I will take care of de corpses here. Take dis torch. Its fires are blessed by priests of Bwonsamdi, de loa of death.
Burn any corpses of my people dat you see. Each corpse burned means less power for dese monsters' blood magic.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Ceremonial Torch on Zandalari corpses.
